Roadtrips Special Statement Regarding the 2022 Winter Games in Beijing

The International Olympic Committee and the Beijing Organizing Committee have announced that 2022 Winter Games will take place without international spectators due to COVID-19 and a concern for public health. Beijing’s Winter Games are scheduled for February 4-20, 2022.

Our 2026 Winter Games packages are coming soon! Register your interest with us for front of the line access to this exciting event in Milan and Cortina, Italy. Join our pre-sale list by contacting one of our Sports Travel Specialists at 1-800-465-1765 or by submitting a Custom Trip Quote request.

Luxury Travel Packages to the 2022 Beijing Winter Games

Roadtrips’ Winter Games packages are completely customizable to allow you to enjoy a personalized experience to this incredible event. Our friendly and knowledgeable Sports Travel Specialists will help you design your Winter Games experience with prime accommodations at the Four Seasons Beijing, your choice of event day experiences, private airport transfers, access to Roadtrips’ Hospitality Lounge, and plenty of other extras you can choose from to enhance your vacation. As always, all of our guests have access to the famous high touch service Roadtrips has become known for. Each of our Winter Games guests will be well taken care of by our pre-travel concierges, our personal meet-and-greet team at the airport, and our professional onsite hosts on the ground in Beijing.

Take advantage of our 29 years of experience at the world’s biggest sporting events and make this your most memorable travel experience yet! The Winter Games are always a popular event and we’re proud to offer our guests the best of Beijing. Complete 2022 Winter Games Travel Packages start at $7,925 per person.

To get started planning your 2022 Winter Games custom travel experience, contact one of our Sports Travel Specialists at 1-800-465-1765 or submit a Custom Trip Quote request.
